content: I just found out that this issue was actually a regression, and the issue was prioritized before I found the regression, so should its priority be discussed again? I added regression-untriaged because I wasn't sure which commit introduced the issue.

Hi @fee1-dead thanks for your follow-up analysis of issue #84632. As you point out it dates back to 1.13 so I lean to say nothing requiring urgent attention.
Though now I'm unsure on why the recursion_limit is seemingly being ignored and if this requires more eyeballs on it :thinking:
@WG-prioritization any comment on this?
yeah, a stable-to-stable regression that old usually means that we don't need to be revising our existing prioirities
